SpeachSequence.Subtitles: You barely escaped that dragon in Helgen, only to be ambushed on your way to Whiterun. What a shame.
I felt sorry for you. So much potential! I simply couldn't let it go to waste. I'll allow you to continue from where you left off.
To make that possible, I've stolen a brand-new flesh vessel for you. Donâ€™t worry about the previous occupant. They won't mind. We've sorted it out.
